    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_SYSTEM_TEMPERATURE

        public static final javax.measure.Quantity<javax.measure.quantity.Temperature> DEFAULT_SYSTEM_TEMPERATURE
        Standard system temperature [temperature] (293 K = 20 C)

      • DEFAULT_MACRO_VISCOSITY

        public static final javax.measure.Quantity<DynamicViscosity> DEFAULT_MACRO_VISCOSITY
        Standard system macro viscosity [pressure per time] (1 mPa*s = 1cP = Viscosity of Water at 20 C) as determined by Kalwarczyk, Tomasz, et al. "Comparative analysis of viscosity of complex liquids and cytoplasm of mammalian cells at the nanoscale." Nano letters 11.5 (2011): 2157-2163. Average of both cell types.

      • DEFAULT_MATRIX_VISCOSITY

        public static final javax.measure.Quantity<DynamicViscosity> DEFAULT_MATRIX_VISCOSITY
        Standard system matrix viscosity [pressure per time] (1 mPa*s = 1cP = Viscosity of Water at 20 C) as determined by Kalwarczyk, Tomasz, et al. "Comparative analysis of viscosity of complex liquids and cytoplasm of mammalian cells at the nanoscale." Nano letters 11.5 (2011): 2157-2163.

      • DEFAULT_SYSTEM_EXTEND

        public static final javax.measure.Quantity<javax.measure.quantity.Length> DEFAULT_SYSTEM_EXTEND
        Standard system extend [length] (5 um)

      • DEFAULT_SIMULATION_EXTEND

        public static final double DEFAULT_SIMULATION_EXTEND
        Standard simulation extend [pseudo length] 500
